channel.title: MyMacCleaner Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.1.1
item.description:
What's New in Version 0.1.1

  • - `pageTopPadding` theme constant for consistent page layouts - All feature views now use dedicated top padding (32pt) for better visual consistency - Permissions page now uses consistent header styling (fonts, spacing) matching other views - Permissions refresh button now uses GlassActionButton component like other pages - NavigationSectionTests updated to include all 10 navigation sections

item.title: Version 0.1.1
item.description:

item.title: Version 0.1.0
item.description:
What's New in Version 0.1.0

  • - Initial release with full feature set - Sparkle integration for seamless updates
